uvi.description:
btrfs: fix abort logic in btrfs_replace_file_extents

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.75 by commit 0e32a2b85c7d92ece86c17dfef390c5ed79c6378. For more details please see the references link.
